title: AITA: Is It Weird That He Has His Deceased Wife's Name Tattooed On Him?!
description:
Dealing with a death is never easy, especially when you were close to the person, better yet, married to that person. Some people cope with death differently and for some, that means getting memorable tattoos.
That’s what one of our listeners did and now it’s seeming to backfire.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
